page.title: 04Saint Anne's Tide
page.content:
{Saint Anne}is the Patron Saint of Catterick Parish Church,and each year Saint Anne's Tide is celebrated.
Saint Anne was the grandmother of Jesus,and each year there is a{Flower {Festival}at Saint Anne's Tide. In 1985 the Flower Festival had over one hundred arrangements,and was open to the public on Saturday 20th and Sunday 21st July.Local organisations and individuals were responsible for the flower arrangements.This was a popular occasion with village people, and the church looked particularly beautiful.
